message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1800000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $1600000. This is the best I can do at this time.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1600000. I'd like to propose a price of $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm offering it to you for $1500000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1500000. I'd like to propose a price of $1000000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.

I'm surprised you're willing to walk away, Bob. I'm not willing to meet you at $1000000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers, which is $1300000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1300000. I'd like to propose a price of $900000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.

I'm starting to think we're not going to come to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a price that's closer to my minimum. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000. This is my final counteroffer.
